alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Haralson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 5:31PM EDT until June 25 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Haralson County in northwestern Georgia... West central Carroll County in northwestern Georgia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 531 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tallapoosa, or 9 miles southwest of Buchanan, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Buchanan, Bremen, Tallapoosa, Mount Zion and Waco. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
